item.title: Abrego Garcia Faces Justice
item.description: The administration has finally availed itself of the obvious option.

item.title: Michelle Obama’s Latest Lament Hints at a Gender Politics Reset
item.description: Whether the former first lady realizes it or not, reality — both political and biological — is making a comeback.

item.title: The ‘Big, Beautiful’ Budget Bill Must Reflect Pro-Life Values
item.description: Senate Republicans should agree with their House colleagues that it’s time for Planned Parenthood and abortion vendors to go fund themselves.

item.title: Self-Government Takes Practice. We’ve Stopped Rehearsing
item.description: From Madison’s literary society to today’s campus silencing, we forgot what democracy requires.

item.title: The Alliance of Qatar and China Is Dangerous to the U.S.
item.description: Beijing and Doha are reinforcing one another. Washington must ensure that they don’t do so by weakening America.
